data.persona: I am usually small, and always covered in scales. My blood is cold, so I always try to stay warm. Green is the most common lizard tone, but we come in many colors.
data.description:
You are in the cactus field entrance.
The field entrance leads to a man made path in the desert leading to the next village. It is hot and barren. There is barely any form of plants or animals besides a few cactus. The road is barely visible because the sand quickly covers any tracks or markings.
The snake is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the snake
data.mid_motivation: I want to stop the snake from killing me, and I want to eat the snake to get strength to make it to the next village
data.long_motivation: I want to start a new life in the next village; maybe I will find an owner

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go next village to find a new home
